context.content: Write a short story about a robot learning to paint. Keep it to 2-3 sentences.

original_text: Once there was a robot who could perform complex calculations and complete tasks with precision, but it longed to express itself in a more creative way. So, it decided to learn how to paint. With each stroke of the brush, the robot discovered the joy of blending colors and creating beautiful works of art, proving that even machines can find beauty in creativity.
edited_text: Once there was a android who could perform complex calculations and complete tasks with precision, but it longed to express itself in a more creative way. So, it decided to learn how to sculpt. With each stroke of the brush, the android discovered the joy of blending colors and creating beautiful works of art, proving that even machines can find beauty in creativity.
